lg.l: prastāve karmaṇāṃ yasya praṇāmaṃ kurvate budhāḥ |
pratyūhānāṃ nivṛttarthaṃ taṃ namāmi gajānanam || 1 ||
guravo naḥ prasīdantu gurukāruṇyaśālinaḥ |
antevāsi-manaḥpadma-samunmīlana-bhāskarāḥ || 2 ||
vīcī-sthāne sahasraṃ marataka-parigha-spardhi bibhrad bhujānām utpheno hāra-jālair aruṇa-rucir anantāhi-ratna-prabhābhiḥ |
bibhrāṇaḥ śaṅkham antaś caram acaram anirvāpaṇīyaṃ ca tejaḥ pāyād vaḥ śārṅgadhanvā śayita iva samudraikadeśe samudraḥ || 1 ||

ab.p:
atha nāṭakārambhe śiṣṭācāram anuvidadhānaḥ kavir nāṭyādau sāmājikān prati nartakena prayoktavyam āśīrvādaṃ nibadhnāti — vīcīsthāna ityādinā ||
asya ca kavinā nartakamukhena devatā-stuti-rūpa-maṅgala-pūrvakaṃ kṛtasyāśīrvādasya nāṭakanibandhanāvighna-parisamāptiḥ phalam, nartakasya ca nāṭyādau tatkīrtanāt ātmanā prayujyamānasya nāṭyaprayogasyāvigha-parisamāptiḥ |
atra ca nāndyante tataḥ praviśatīty uktyā nāndyāḥ krṭatvenānūdyamānatvāt kathāsūtradhārasyaivāyam āśīrvādaḥ na nāndīsūtradhārasya |
tathā coktaṃ—The first half is close to Nāṭyaśāstra 5.161 (quoted in Bhāvaprakāśa 8.77 and Nāṭakalakṣaṇaratnakośa 119); the second half is equivalent to Daśarūpaka 3.2. I could not find any reference for the two half-verses together.
prasādya raṅgānniṣkrāmet sūtradhāraḥ sahānugaḥ |
praviśya tadvad aparaḥ kāvyārthaṃ sthāpayen naṭaḥ ||
iti |
nāndyante praviśatīty ukte nāndyanta eva praveśaḥ
na tu tataḥ pūrvam ity asyārthasyābhidheyatvān nāndyāḥ pūrvakṛtatvam eva sidhyati
na praveśasyānantaryam ity ata uktaṃ tata iti |
ānantaryoktyā cāntarā karmāntarānuṣṭhānanirāso vyajyate |
tena ca nāndīm ārabhyābharatavākyokteḥ prayujyamānānāṃ nāṭyakarmaṇāṃ parasparasaṃbandhaḥ sūcitaḥ |
anukārya-tādātmya-buddhi-go
carasya naṭasya prekṣakaiḥ pratyakṣeṇa vartamānatayā gṛhyamāṇatvāt sarvatraiva praviśatīti vartamānanirdeśaḥ |
alpākṣaram anekārthaṃ sāravad gūḍhanirṇayam |
astobham anavadyaṃ ca vākyaṃ sūtraṃ pracakṣate ||Kāvyamīmāṃsā
ity uktalakṣaṇaṃ sūtraṃ vākyaṃ dhārayatīti sūtradhāraḥ |

evaṃ praviṣṭena sūtradhāreṇa sāmājika-hṛdayāvarjanārtham āśīrvādaḥ kriyate || śārṅgadhanvā vaḥ pāyād iti ||
atra adhikṛtānadhikṛtayor adhikṛte pratipattir garīyasīŚṛṅgāraprakāśa p. 366. iti nyāyena rāmarūpasya nārāyaṇasyaiva nāṭake netṛtayā 'dhikṛtatvāt sarvadevatātmakatvāc ca bhavagataḥ pātṛtvena nirdeśaḥ |
tatrāpi śārṅgadhavety anena jagad-rakṣaṇa-sannāhaṃ darśayati | rakṣaṇe prārthyamāne rakṣaṇodyatasyaiva iti nyāyāt | dhanuṣaś cety anaṅpratyayaḥ samāsāntaḥ | saṃbodhanena vinā ca iti yuṣmacchabda-prayogaḥ tat-kāryasyābhimukhyasya siddhatvād iti mantavyam |
sāmājikānāṃ hi nūtanotkṛṣṭa-nāṭakārtha-rasāsvādināṃ tat-prayoga-darśana-kutūhalitvena nāṭya-karma-nipuṇa-naṭa-vara-darśana-mātra evābhimukhyaṃ saṃjātam |
vaḥ pāyād iti svaprabhāvenaiva labdhasarvārthatvāt teṣāṃ pālanam evāśāsitavyaṃ na tv alabdhasya lābha iti darśitam |
atha katham anugrāhyeṇa nartakenānugrāhaka-sāmājikaviṣaya āśīrvādaḥ kriyata iti cet tad-āśrayatvād eva tad-rakṣaṇam āśāsyata iti brūmaḥ | sa hi tadāyatta-jīvikopāyaḥ tad-rakṣaṇam āśāsta iti yuktam |
athavā sarvasyaiva jagato rakṣaṇasya karma-sthiti-nibandhanatvāt karma-sthiteś ca tad-adhīnatvāt tad-rakṣaṇam āśāsyate | yathoktaṃ—Manusmṛti 3.17.
agnau prāstāhutiḥ samyag ādityam upatiṣṭhate |
ādityāj jāyate vṛṣṭir vṛṣṭer annaṃ tataḥ prajāḥ ||
iti |
svato niṣkalasya bhagavatas tat-tat-sādhyānuguṇatvena parikalpiteṣu bahuṣu mūrti-bhedeṣu pradhāna-bhūta-mūrti-bhedaṃ deśāvasthā-viśeṣābhyām anusaṃdhānārthaṃ viśinaṣṭi—samudreti ||
kṣīrasamudrasyaikadeśe śeṣe śayitaḥ samudra iveti | aparaḥ śuddha-jala-mayaḥ samudra iva | kṣīra-samudra-vivakṣāyāṃ marataka-parigha-spardhīty asyāsaṅgatiḥ syāt |
atra śrautī pūrṇopamālaṅkāraḥ | tathāha—Kāvyaprakāśa 10.87.
sādharmyam upamā bhede pūrṇā luptā ca sāgrimā |
śrautyārthī ca bhaved vākye samāse taddhite tathā ||
iti |
yathā bhagavataḥ samudra-sādharmyaṃ sidhyati tathā viśinaṣṭi—vīcīsthāna ityādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhir viśeṣaṇaiḥ |
marataka-parigha-spardhi maratakamayaiḥ parighaiḥ spardhituṃ śīlam asya ||
bhujānāṃ sahasraṃ vīcīsthāne bibhrad iti || śayitasya bhagavataḥ uparibhāge vṛttyā saṅkhyābahutvāt marataka-samāna
varṇatvāc ca vīcī-sādharmyaṃ bhujānām uktam |
hārajālānāṃ dhāvalyāt ūrdhvadeśavartitayā ca phena-sāmyāt bhagavata udgata-phenatvāropaḥ |
anantasyāheḥ śeṣasya anantānām ahīnāṃ ca ratna-prabhābhir iti | atra śabda-śleṣo 'laṅkāraḥ | yad uktaṃ—Kāvyaprakāśa 10.84.
vācya-bhedena bhinnā yad yugapadbhāṣaṇa-spṛśaḥ |
śliṣyanti śabdāḥ śleṣo 'sāv akṣarādibhir aṣṭadhā ||
iti || śaṅkhaṃ bibhrāṇa iti || sa
mudra-viśeṣaṇatva-pakṣe graha-gataikatvavad ekatavam avivakṣitam |
etac ca bhujāntaravartinām āyudhāntarāṇām upalakṣaṇārtham | bhagavadbhujānāṃ sahasrāyudhabhṛttvaṃ jagadrakṣakatvaṃ ca prasiddham eva | yathokaṃ—Viṣṇukeśādipādāntastotra 33.
viśvatrāṇaikadīkṣās tadanuguṇaguṇakṣatranirmāṇadakṣāḥ kartāro durnirūpāḥ sphuṭaguruyaśasāṃ karmaṇām adbhutānām |
śārṅgaṃ bāṇaṃ kṛpāṇaṃ phalakamarigade śaṅkhapadmau sahasraṃ bibhrāṇāḥ śastra-jālaṃ mama dadhatu harer bāhavo mohahānim ||
iti |
antaḥ udare carācarātmakaṃ jagat bibhrāṇaḥ | na ca pralayakāla eva bhagavatas tādavasthyam iti vācyam | kṛṣṇena sthiti-kāle 'pi ātmodare sakala-loka-vistārasya svamātre darśitatvāt |
asya samudraviśeṣaṇatve sthāvarān parvatavanādīn jaṅgamān jalamānuṣādīṃś ca bibhrāṇaḥ |
atrāpy ekatvam avivakṣitam |
antarhṛdaye 'nirvāpaṇīyam avināśyam nityaṃ saccidānandaṃ brahmajyotiḥ bibhrāṇaḥ anyatraurvāgnim | atrārthaśleṣiko 'laṅkāraḥ | deśataḥ kālato vastutaś cāparicchedyasyātmajyotiṣo hṛdaye bibhrāṇa iti deśaparicchedaḥ kālpanika iti jñeyam |
evaṃ viśeṣaṇair bhagavataḥ samudra-sāmye siddhe samudraikadeśe śayitaḥ samudra ivety upamāvākyasyāvṛttyā utprekṣālaṅkāro 'py āśrīyate | prakṛtasya bhagavataḥ samudratvena saṃbhāvyamānatvāt | yathoktaṃ—Kāvyaprakāśa 10.92. saṃbhāvanam athotprekṣā prakṛtasya samena yat iti | atra śārṅgadhanvety anena
jagad-rakṣaṇotsāhavattvena śārṅga-dhanur-viśiṣṭatvena ca bhagavata upādānaṃ asmin nāṭake tad-aṃśa-bhūtasya jagad-rakṣaṇārtham avatīrṇasya rāmasya netṛtvaṃ tac-caritasya jagad-rakṣaṇa-nimittasya dhanur-vyāpāra-sādhya-rāvaṇādi-vadhasyādhikārikavṛttatvaṃ ca darśayati |
evaṃ pratyūha-nivāraṇa-sāmājikāvarjana-phalam āśīrvādaṃ vidhāya bhāratī-vṛtty-aṅgabhūtāmukha-prastāvāya parikramaṇaipathya-śālāvalokana-pūrvakaṃ naṭīm ākārayati—ārya ity ādinā ||

bhāratī saṃskṛta-prāyo vāg-vyāpāro narāśrayaḥ |
bhedaiḥ prarocanāyuktaiḥ vīthī-prahasanāmukhaiḥ ||Daśarūpaka 3.5.
iti bhāratīlakṣaṇam | āmukhaṃ caivaṃ lakṣitam—
sūtradhāro naṭīṃ brūte māriṣaṃ vā vidūṣakam |
svakāryaprastutākṣepi citroktyā yat tad āmukham || prastāvanā vā |Daśarūpaka 3.7.
iti |

ārya iti |
naṭī-sūtra-bhṛtoḥ parasparāhvānam āryaśabdena kartavyam | yathokaṃ—Daśarūpaka 3.67.
bhagavanto 'dharair vācyāvidvad-devarṣi-liṅginaḥ |
viprāmātyāgrajāś cāryā naṭīsūtrabhṛtau mithaḥ ||
iti |
atrāryaśabdena śraiṣṭyavācinā nāṭyaprayogocitaviśiṣṭa-guṇa-saṃpannatvam api tasyā lakṣyate |
itas tāvat āgamyatām iti śeṣaḥ | tāvacchabdena prāthamyavācinā prathamam āgamyatām anantaraṃ mahākāryāntaram apy astīti sūcitam | tataś ca tacchravaṇautsukyena tasyā āgamana-saṃbhramo darśitaḥ |
ata eva praviśyety uktam | yatra saṃbhramādi-citta-vikāram ālambya pātrapraveśaḥ tatra lyab-antena praveśakriyām uktvā 'heti uttarakriyāpadādhyāhāreṇa vacana-śeṣatayā praveśanasya nirdeśaḥ ||
ārya iyam asmīti ||
āgateti sidhyati |
tatra pratyakṣa-siddhasyāpy āgamanasya nivedanena tacchravaṇautsukyaṃ vyajyate | evaṃ tadautsukyadarśanena prasanno bhūtvā cikīrṣitaṃ karma nivedayati—ārye ityādinā ||

lg.l: abhirañjanīṃ janānāṃ sahāyasādhyām gurūpadeśena |
dhuram udvahāmi gurvīṃ nṛpa iva bharatādibhir vōḍhām || 2 ||

ab.p: ārye nāṭyaprayogasahakāriṣu pradhānabhūte | atas tvāṃ vinā kasmā anyasmā etan nivedayāmi | idānīṃ kāṃciddhuram udvahāmi avaśyakartavyatvenādhyavasyāmi |
kiṃrūpam iti viśeṣa-jijñāsāyām āha—bharatādibhir voḍhām iti ||

anena nāṭyaprayogātmikāṃ dhuram ity uktaṃ bhavati | bharata-munir hi viriñca-praṇītaṃ nāṭyavedam abhyasya tatprayogaṃ kṛtvā tadviṣaya-nibandhanaṃ cakāra |
yathoktaṃ—Daśarūpaka 1.4.
uddhṛtyoddhṛtya sāraṃ yam akhila-nigamān nāṭyavedaṃ viriñcaś cakre tasya prayogaṃ munir api bharatas tāṇḍavaṃ nīlakaṇṭhaḥ |
iti |
bharatādibhir ity anenārvācīnānāṃ nāṭyaprayogasya tad-upajñatvaṃ darśayati | bharata-muninā yathā prayogaprakāro nirvyūḍhaḥ tathā prayoktuṃ mamādhyavasāya ity api darśitam | ādiśabdena saṃpradāyapravartakānām ācāryāṇāṃ grahaṇam |
voḍhām ity asyaikapadatve 'sādhutvaṃ pṛthak-padatve vā-śabdasya viśeṣaṇa-samuccayārthatvena kathañcid upayogaḥ ||

gurvīm iti || bharatokta-prayoga-prakāra-saṃpādanena nāyaketivṛtta-rasādi-mahimnā cānīṣatkaraprayogām | evaṃ gurutaraṃ nāṭyaprayogaṃ kartuṃ katham adhyavasyasīty ata
āha—gurūpadeśeneti || bālyāt-prabhṛti paricaraṇādhibhiḥ prasāditānāṃ mahātīrthānāṃ śikṣāpūrvakeṇopadeśena upadiṣṭasya punaḥ punar abhyāsena cety arthaḥ |
yathoktaṃ—Unidentified.
kaiśorāt-prabhṛti prasādita-mahātīrthasya śikṣā-balād abhyāsāc ca jitaśrameṇa viduṣā yena prayoga-śriyā |
vidyāyāṃ nijayā svato guṇavatā mādhuryam ādhīyate gāmbhīryaṃ ca paraṃ sa eva viduṣāṃ saṃyak prasūte rasān ||
iti |

atra madāhvānāṃ kimartham ity apekṣāyām āha—sahāyasādhyām iti ||
anekaika-nāyaka-prayojya-bhāṇādi-vyavacchedaḥ kṛtaḥ |
yathoktaṃ—Daśarūpaka 3.49.
bhāṇas tadtu dhūrta-caritaṃ svānubhūtaṃ pareṇa vā |
yatropavarṇayed eko nipuṇaḥ paṇḍito viṭaḥ ||
iti |
sahāyais tat-tat-pātrocita-pāṭha-gīti-gati-rasa-prayogādinipuṇaiḥ saha sādhyām | yato nisargato nāṭaka-prayogasya sahāyasādhyatvam ata eva tvad-āhvānaṃ kṛtam |

evam ati-prayatna-sādhyāyā dhuraḥ kiṃ prayojanam ity ata āha—abhirañjanīṃ janānām iti ||
na hi kasyacid anyasya karmaṇaḥ evaṃ sarva-janānurāga-phalatvam asya |
janānurāgaś ca sarvasaṃpat-kāraṇam |
yathoktaṃ—janānurāgaprabhavā hi saṃpadaḥ iti |
ato janmāntarārjita-sukṛta-paripākenaiveyaṃ vidyā labhyate |
yathoktaṃ—Nāṭakalakṣaṇaratnakośa 7.
api labhyeta vidvadbhir muktir abhyāsakauśalāt |
na tu nāṭaka-vidyeyaṃ sarva-lokānurañjinī ||
iti |
ato 'smākaṃ kula-dharmatvāt para-prayojanatvāc ca asyāṃ dhuri mahān ādaraḥ kārya ity arthaḥ ||

nṛpa iveti || yathādyatano rājā pūrvarājanyair bharatādibhir ūḍhāṃ dhuram udvahati tathety arthaḥ |
nānāvidhānugrāhya-niyamya-janānurūpānugraha-niyamādi-vyāpārasya paramotsāha-sādhyatvād gurvīm |
atrārthaśāstrādigocaro gurūpadeśa evodvahane hetuḥ | amātyādi-sahāya-sāpekṣatvaṃ janānurāga-phalatvaṃ cātrāpi vidyata eva |
atra arthaśleṣasyopamāṅgatvam | uktaṃ cārthaśleṣasya lakṣaṇaṃ—Kāvyaprakāśa 10.96.
śleṣaḥ sa vākya ekasmin yatrānekārthatā bhavet
iti |
atra śleṣeṇa nṛpa-naṭa-dhurayos sādharmye 'vagata eva ekarūpavyāpārodvahanātmakaṃ naṭasya nṛpa-sādṛśyaṃ pratīyata iti śleṣasya tad-aṅgatvam |

praviśya raṅgān niṣkrāmet sūtradhāraḥ sahānugaḥ |
sthāpakaḥ praviśet tatra sūtradhāra-samākṛtiḥ ||
divya-martye sa tad-rūpo miśram anyataras tayoḥ |
sūcayed vastu bījaṃ vā mukhaṃ pātram athāpi vā ||Bhāvaprakāśana 8.78–79.
ity uktalakṣaṇānusāreṇa vastu-sūcanam api kṛtam |
rāmo hy agastyādīnāṃ gurūṇām upadeśena sarva-rākṣasa-vadhātmikāṃ mahotsāha-sādhya-setu-bandhādigarbhatvena gurvīṃ sahāya-bhūta-sugrīvādibhiḥ saha sādhyāṃ jagad-rakṣaṇa-phalatvena sarva-janānurañjinīṃ dhuraṃ kartum adhyavasāyam akārṣīd iti |
guruśabdena mātāpitṛvivakṣāyāṃ gurūpadeśena sahita iti yojyam |

evam ukta-viśeṣaṇa-viśiṣṭāyā dhuro rūpakāntara-gocaratvenāparyavasānāt nāṭakaika-viṣayatvam avadhārya tad-viśeṣa-jijñāsayā tad-uktaṃ gauravātiśayam ukti-saṃvāda-bhūtenānubhavenālakṣyānuvadati—āryasyeti ||

sp.speaker: naṭī
sp.p: ajjassa garīaṃ dāva ahiāraṃ āāro evva sūedi |

ab.p:
adhikriyate iti karma-vyutpattyā adhikāro nāṭyaprayogaḥ tasya gauravaṃ dṛṣṭer utphullamadhyatva-dhīratvādir ākāra eva tāvat prathamaṃ vacanāt pūrvam eva sūcayati |
na tv atra vacanāpekṣā yata ākāreṇa vacanād api sphuṭataram avagamyate ataḥ adhikāra-gauravaṃ na vaktavyam eva |
adhikāra-gurutva-hetus tu vacana-sāpekṣa iti vākyaparyavasānam |
āryasya ākāra evety anvayaḥ |
evaṃ tad-ukti-sūcita-jijñāsyatvaṃ gaurava-hetuṃ vivakṣan uktam evārtham anumanyate—atha kim iti ||

sp.speaker: sūtradhāraḥ
sp.p: atha kim | sundari nanu bahūnām asādhāraṇo durgamaḥ panthāḥ |

ab.p:
asādhāraṇaḥ panthāḥ bahūnāṃ durgamo nanu ity anvayaḥ | atra bahūnām iti ṣaṣṭyāḥ na lokāvyayetiAṣṭādhyāyī 2.3.69. pratiṣedhe 'pi dustyajaṃ kiṃ dhṛtātmanāmBhāgavata Purāṇa 10.1.58. ity ādiśiṣṭa-prayogānusāreṇa sādhutvam |
pathiśabdo hi abhimata-deśāntara-prāpti-sādhane saṃskṛte deśaviśeṣe mukhyayā vṛttyā prasiddhaḥ |
tatrābhimata-sādhanatvaṃ nāma yo guṇas taṃ lakṣayitvā tad-guṇa-yogiṣu vidyāviśeṣeṣu gauṇyā vṛttyā vartate |
atra prakaraṇena ayaṃ nāṭake paryavasyati vidyāntareṣv apy asya prayogaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yathā—Veṅkaṭādri's Mahimnastava, v. 7.
ṛju-kuṭila-nānāpathajuṣāṃ nṛṇām eko gamyas tvam asi payasāmarṇava iva
iti |
gauṇīvṛttiḥ pūrvair evaṃ lakṣitā—Tantravārttika p. 353.
abhidheyāvinābhūta-pratītir lakṣaṇocyate |
lakṣyamāṇa-guṇair yogād vṛtter iṣṭā tu gauṇatā ||
iti |
prakṛṣṭatama-gāmbhīryaudārya-prauḍhatādi-vacana-guṇa-śālitayā pratipādyetivṛttātigauraveṇāsādharaṇo lokotkṛṣṭo yo nāṭaka-viśeṣaḥ sa bahūnāṃ durgamaḥ duṣkara-prayoga eva |
nanur evārthe |
kasyacit tu puṇya-śālino 'bhyāsādy-atiśayenātiprayatna-sādhya-prayogo 'yaṃ bhaved api |
ata evaṃbhūta-nāṭaka-gocaratvena mamādhikārasya gurutvaṃ yuktam evety arthaḥ |
athavā durgamo yaḥ panthāḥ sa bahūnām asādhāraṇaḥ sādhāraṇo na bhavati |
aśrāddha-bhojī brāhmaṇa itivat prasajya-pratiṣedhe nañ |
gāmbhīryādiguṇayogāt duṣkara-prayogo yo nāṭakaviśeṣaḥ saḥ anyair aprayukta-pūrvatvād asmābhiḥ prayokṣyamāṇaḥ san asmān praty asādhāraṇo bhavati |
ato 'syātiprayatna-sādhyatvāt adhikārasya gurutvam iti bhāvaḥ |
iha nanu bahūnām ity ārabhya prajñāvilasitam ity antena bhāratī-vṛtty-aṅga-bhūtā prarocanā kriyate |
yathoktam—Daśarūpaka 3.6cd
unmukhīkaraṇaṃ yatra praśaṃsātaḥ prarocanā
iti |
kavi-kāvya-prayoktrādīnāṃ praśaṃsayā sāmājika-sahāyādīnām aunmukyāpādanaṃ prarocanety arthaḥ |
evam asādhāraṇa-śabdenādhyavasāyasyābhinava-nāṭakatvaṃ śaṅkamānā paripṛcchati—ajjetyādinā ||

atra pṛcchater lakṣaṇayā 'bhidhānārthatvam |
asādhāraṇa-śabdena ko viśeṣo vivakṣita ity arthaḥ |
purātanāni nāṭakāni prāyeṇāsmābhir anyaiś ca prayukta-pūrvāṇīti teṣām asādhāraṇatvaṃ na ghaṭate adyatanaṃ nāṭakaṃ tādṛśaṃ ca mayā nāśrāvi ity asādhāraṇa-śabdena yo viśeṣo 'bhipretaḥ sa ucyatām ity arthaḥ |
atha tam eva viśeṣam āryamiśra-śāsana-rūpeṇa vacanena sa-bahumānam ācaṣṭe—ārya ityādinā ||

sp.speaker: sūtradhāraḥ
sp.p: ārye dakṣiṇāpathād āgatam āścarya-cūḍāmaṇiṃ nāma nāṭakam abhinayāmreḍita-saubhāgyam abhilaṣāma ity āryamiśrāṇāṃ śāsanam |

ab.p: tava prayoga-naipuṇam anurūpa-prayojya-lābhāt saphalīkariṣyāmīti saṃbodhanābhiprāyaḥ ||

dakṣiṇāpathād iti || atidūra-deśodbhūtam idaṃ deśaṃ prāptaṃ na tv atratyena kenacin nirmitam atraiva vartamānam ity arthaḥ |
anena nāṭakasya guṇavattamatvaṃ loka-parigrahānuvṛttyā darśitam |
nāṭakam āgatam iti | na tu kenacit deśāntara evaṃbhūtaṃ nāṭakam astīti loka-vārtā-śravaṇena taddeśaṃ gatvā nītam |
kintu tat-tad-deśeṣu tat-tad-abhiyukta-parigraheṇa nāṭakaṃ svayam evāgatam iti cetanavan nāṭakasyāgamanasaukaryaṃ darśayitum āgamana-kartṛtva-nirdeśaḥ |
vīrakāryādbhuta-rasa-bhūyiṣṭhatvena āścarya-karāṇāṃ cūḍāmaṇir ity āścarya-cūḍāmaṇir iti saṃjñā | āścarya-bhūtaś cūḍāmaṇir yasmin pratipādyatvenāṅgīkṛta iti vā ||

nāṭakam iti || prakaraṇādīṃ rūpakāntarāṇāṃ prakṛti-bhūtam
itihāsa-purāṇādi-prasiddhetivṛtta-sahitaṃ bīja-bindu-patākā-prakarī-kārya-lakṣaṇārtha-prakṛti-pañcakopetaṃ
prārambha-yatna-prāptyāśā-niyatāpti-phalāgamāvasthā-pañcaka-samanvitaṃ
mukha-pratimukha-garbhāvamarśa-nirvahaṇa-saṃjña-sandhi-pañcaka-tad-aṅga-catuṣṣaṣṭi-sahitaṃ
nīrasānucitetivṛtta-sūcaka-viṣkambha-praveśaka-cūlikāṅkāsyāṅkāvatārākhyārthopakṣepaka-pañcaka-viśiṣṭaṃ
mahā-sattvatādi-guṇa-viśiṣṭa-dhīrodāttādy-anyatara-nāyakaṃ
śīlārjavādi-guṇa-viśiṣṭa-svīyā-kanyakānyatara-nāyikaṃ
pīṭhamarda-viṭa-vidūṣakādi-sahāyopabṛṃhita-nāyaka-vyāpāraṃ
vidarbha-pāñcāla-lāṭa-gauḍākhya-deśa-bhedodbhūta-rīti-catuṣṭaya-saṃpannaṃ
bhāratī-sāttvikī-kaiśiky-ārabhaṭī-saṃjñaka-vṛtti-catuṣṭayopaśobhitam
āvantyā-paurastyā-dākṣiṇātyā-māgadhī-nāmadheya-caturvidha-pravṛtti-cāturyopetaṃ
vibhāvānubhāva-vyabhicāri-sāttvikopabṛmhita-raty-utsāha-sthāyyātmaka-vīra-śṛṅgārāntyatarāṅgirasaṃ
śuddhaikānekānubandhi-dharmārtha-kāma-phalaṃ
yad-rūpakaṃ tan nāṭakam ity ucyate |

āścarya-cūḍāmaṇir nāma nāṭakam astīti śeṣaḥ | tad-abhinayāmreḍita-saubhāgyam abhilaṣāma iti tacchabdo 'dhyāhāryaḥ |
abhinayair vācikāṅgikāhārya-sāttvikair āmreḍitaṃ saubhāgyaṃ yasyeti vigrahaḥ | āmreḍita-śabdenārthaparyālocanāsvādaḥ pūrvam eva saṃvṛtta iti darśitam |
idānīṃ prayoga-darśanam abhilaṣāma ity uktam |
mahatāṃ niyojyaṃ prati nijābhilāṣa-nivedanam abhilaṣita-niyoga-param eva bhavatīti śāsanam ity uktam |
evam uktasya nāṭaka-viśeṣasya pravirala-vidvaj-jana-dakṣiṇāpathāpādānatvenāviśvasanīyatvāt aprayojyatvaṃ manyamānā sāpahāsam āha |

sp.speaker: naṭī
sp.p: ajja accāhidaṃ khu edaṃ, āāsaṃ pasavaï pupphaṃ, siadāo tellaṃ uppādaaṃti, jaï dakkhiṇāo disāo āadaṃ ṇāḍaaṇibaṃdhaṇam |ārya atyāhitaṃ khalv etat, ākāśaṃ prasūte puṣpaṃ, sikatāḥ tailam utpādayanti, yadi dakṣiṇasya diśaḥ āgataṃ nāṭakanibandhanam |

ab.p:
āhitaṃ sthitaṃ tad atikramya vartata ity atyāhitaṃ saṃbaddham ity arthaḥ |
ākāśaṃ puṣpaṃ prasūte sikatās tailam utpādayanti tarhīti sidhyati | yadi dakṣiṇasyā diśa āgataṃ nāṭaka-nibandhanam iti || nibandhanam eva tāvat tata āgataṃ na dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ kiṃ punar viśiṣṭaṃ nāṭakākhyaṃ nibandhanam iti darśayituṃ nibandhanam ity uktam |
yadi tata āgataṃ nāṭaka-nibandhanaṃ tarhīdaṃ vṛttāntaram ākāśādibhyaḥ puṣpādi-jananam eva tat-tulyam ity arthaḥ |
nidarśanālaṅkāraḥ | yathoktaṃ—Kāvyaprakāśa 10.97.
nidarśanā |
abhavad-vastu-saṃbanda upamāparikalpakaḥ
atrāsaṃbhavann eva ākāśādi-puṣpādyor janyajanakabhāva uktaḥ sann upamāyāṃ paryavasyati |
atha tasya doṣābhāsādi-niveśaṃ nirasyann āha—ārya iti ||

lg.l: guṇāḥ pramāṇaṃ na diśāṃ vibhāgaḥ nidarśanaṃ nanv idam eva tatra |
stana-dvaye te hari-candanaṃ ca hāraś ca nīhāra-marīci-gauraḥ || 3 ||

ab.p:
ārye mā bhaivaṃ voca iti śeṣaḥ | atropacinv ity anena guṇādānasya puṣpāpacaya-sāmyaṃ dyotitam | janma-bhūmim uddiśya yo 'bhiniveśaḥ doṣa-grahaṇa-nirbandhaḥ tam apahastaya parityajety arthaḥ |
ubhayatrāpi sadṛṣṭāntaṃ hetum āha—paśyetyādinā ||

guṇā evopādāne pramāṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ hāne ca doṣā eva kāraṇam ity arthāt sidhyati |
ubhayatrāpi na digvibhāgaḥ kāraṇam || idam eveti ||
na hy asmat-sannihitāt saṃpratipannāc ca sādhīyo 'vyannidarśanāntaram asti |
athātma-gata-hāra-haricandanāvalokana-pūrvakaṃ sabahumānaṃ tad-uktim eva saṃvadati—yujyate ratnākaraḥ khalusa deśa iti ||

p.s: ajja kadamo uṇa so kavī jo attaṇo pañjārūvaṃ ṇibandhaṇavvājeṇa desaṃtaraṃ pesidukāmo |yujyate, ratnākaraḥ khalu sa deśaḥ | ārya, katamaḥ punaḥ sa kaviḥ ya ātmanaḥ prajñārūpaṃ nibandhana-vyājena deśāntaraṃ preṣitukāmaḥ |

ab.p:
athaivaṃbhūtaṃ nāṭaka-karaṇa-samarthaṃ kaviṃ bahumanyamānā tan-nāmadheyādikaṃ paripṛcchati—āryeityādinā ||
ya ātmanaḥ prajñā-svarūpaṃ nibandhana-vyājena preṣitukāmaḥ nibandhana-nirmāṇārambha-samaye saṃvṛtta iti vākya-parisamāptiḥ |
kavayo hi sva-buddhi-vyāpāra-vaicitryaṃ deśāntare kālāntare ca prakāśayituṃ kāvyam ārabhanti |
yathoktaṃ—Cited in the Kāvyaprakāśa
divam apy upayātānām ākalpam analpaguṇagaṇā yeṣām |
ramayanti jaganti giraḥ kathamiva kavayo na te vandyāḥ ||
iti |
ādhāreṇa puruṣeṇa vinā ādheyasya prajñā-svarūpasya deśāntara-prāpteḥ pratīyamānatvād ādyo viśeṣo 'laṅkāraḥ |
yathoktaṃ—Kāvyaprakāśa
vinā prasiddham ādhāram ādheyasya vyavasthitiḥ
ekātmā yugapad-vṛttir ekasyānekagocaraḥ ||
anyat-prakurvataḥ kāryam aśaktyasyānya-vastunaḥ |
tathaiva karaṇaṃ ceti viśeṣas trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
iti |
atra kārya-bhūta-vāstava-nibandhana-niṣedha-pūrvakaṃ tat-kāraṇa-bhūta-prajñā-rūpa-samāropas tasminn ādarśa-gata-pratibimbavat sphuṭataram avagamyamānatvād iti jñeyam | nāpahnutir alaṅkāro 'tra saṃbhavati upamānopameyabhāvābhāvāt | evaṃ hi
prakṛtaṃ yanniṣedhyānyat sādhyate sā tv apahnutiḥ |Kāvyaprakāśa 10.146.
ity asya vyākhyānaṃ uktam—upameyam asatyaṃ kṛtvā upamānaṃ satyatayā yat sthāpyate sāpahnutir ity alaṃ vistareṇa | evaṃbhūtaḥ kaviḥ punaḥ sa katamaḥ tacchabdena kaver avaśyābhyupagantavyatvaṃ darśayati |
atha sabahumānam uttaraṃ dadāti |

p.s: unmāda-vāsavadattā-prabhṛtīnāṃ kāvyānāṃ kartuḥ kaveḥ śaktibhadrasyedaṃ prajñāvilasitam |
aye kiṃ nu khalu mayi vijñāpanavyagre śabda iva śrūyate |

ab.p: ārye ucitavādini vivakṣita-vacanāvakāśa-dānāt samucita evāyaṃ praśnaḥ śrūyatām | śrāvya evāyaṃ dhanyo mahākaviḥ || śaktibhadrasyeti || śaktyā kavitva-nidāna-bhūtena saṃskāreṇa bhadra ity arthānugatam eva nāma || prajñā-vilasitam iti || pūrvavat tat-kāryatvena nibandhanasya tattvāropaḥ || unmāda-vāsavadattā-prabhṛtīnāṃ kāvyānāṃ kartur iti || pūrvam eva bahu-prabandha-kartṛtvena prasiddhaḥ | na kevalam idānīm etannibandhana-nibandhṛtvenaiva | anenābhyāsāt pūrva-prabandhebhyo 'sya viśeṣo darśitaḥ | yato 'ham evaṃbhūta-mahākavi-kṛta-nāṭaka-prayoga-gocarāṃ dhuram udvahāmi atas tvam apy ātmocitaṃ pātraṃ praty avadhānaṃ tadekaparatvaṃ kuruṣva | evam ity anena prayoga-sāmagrī-prakāra-lābha uktaḥ |

evaṃ prarocanāṃ kṛtvā prayogātiśayenāṅkādya-pātra-praveśaṃ sūcayitum upakramate—aye iti || kiṃ nu khalv ityādināDaśarūpaka 3.11 ||
eṣo 'yam ity upakẹspāt sūtradhāra-prayogataḥ |
pātra-praveśo yatraiṣa prayogātiśayo mataḥ ||
aye ity acintitopanata-padārthopalambha-saṃbhavam āvegaṃ sūcayati | vijñāpanārthaṃ vyagre prayoga-kālāti-pāta-bhayāt saṃbhrameṇa pravartamāne sati śabda iva śrūyate | ivaśabdo viśeṣānavadhāraṇadyotanārthaḥ | kiṃ ni khalv iti śabda-viśeṣaṃ taddhetuṃ ca nirūpayati—aṅga paśyāmīti || avahito bhūtvā vicārya niścinomīty arthaḥ ||
atha nepathye kriyamāṇa-jyāghoṣaṃ śrutvā niścityāha—bhavatu vijñātam iti ||

lg.l: sapatnīkasya rāmasya vartayan vanyamāspadam |
jyāghoṣeṇaiva saumitriḥ pakvān sattvān vyapohati || 4 ||

ab.p:
bhavatu-śabdaḥ mānasa-niścaye | bhavatvāntaranirṇaye iti | saumitrir jyāghoṣeṇa pakvān pariṇatān | jāyate 'sti vardhate vipariṇamate apakṣīyate mriyata ity āsāṃ ṣaṇṇām avasthānāṃ madhye turīyāṃ vipariṇāmāvasthāṃ prāptān nirūḍha-yauvanatvenātidṛptān ity arthaḥ | sattvān siṃha-vyāghrādīn apohati nirasyati | kimartham ity āha—sapatnīkasyeti || sapatnīkasya rāmasya vanyam āspadaṃ nivāsayogyāṃ parṇaśālām || vartayann iti || hetau śatā | parṇaśālā-nirmāṇārthaṃ duṣṭa-sattva-nirāsaṃ karotīty arthaḥ | anena kevalam aṅkādya-pātra-praveśa eva na sūcitaḥ sapatnīkasya rāmasya praveśo 'pi sūcitaḥ | atrāmukhasya kathodghāta-pravartaka-prayogātiśaya-saṃjñakāni trīṇi asādhāraṇāny aṅgāni uddhātyakāvalagātādīni trayodaśa-vīthy-aṅgāni sādhāraṇānīti ṣoḍaśāṅgam āmukham | sarveṣām aṅgānām ekatra na niyamaḥ |
teṣām anyatamenārthaṃ pātraṃ vākṣipya sūtrabhṛt |
prastāvanānte nirgacchet tato vastu prapañcayet ||
ity uktatvātBhāvaprakāśana 8.138 | atra prayogātiśayenaiva pātra-praveśaḥ sūcitaḥ | yathā śākuntale—eṣa rājeva duṣyantaḥ sāraṅgeṇātiraṃhasā iti | evaṃ prārabdhatvāt prayogasya tad-ārambha-vijñāpanaṃ nirarthakaṃ manyamānaḥ tad-akrṭvaivānantarocita-pātra-bhūmikā-parigrahārthaṃ naṭī-sahitaḥ sūtradhāraḥ nepathyaśālām uddiśya niṣkrāntaḥ | sthāpanety āmukhaparyāyaḥ ||
ab.label: || ity āmukham ||

ab.p:
athātrādau
ādau viṣkambhakaṃ kuryād aṅkaṃ vā kārya-yuktitaḥ |
apekṣitaṃ parityajya nīrasaṃ vastu-vistaram ||
yadā saṃdarśayec cheṣaṃ kuryād viṣkambhakaṃ tadā |
yadā tu sarasaṃ vastu mūlād eva pravartate ||
ādāv eva tadāṅkaḥ syād āmukhākṣepasaṃśrayaḥ |
itiDaśarūpaka 3.28–30 viṣkambhasya pākṣikatvābhidhānād āmukhānte na niyama ity āmukhākṣiptāsyāṅkasyaiva prastāvaḥ kṛtaḥ |
aṅkaś caivaṃ lakṣitaḥ | yathā—
pratyakṣa-netṛ-carito bindu-vyāpti-puraskṛtaḥ |
aṅko nānā-prakārārtha-saṃvidhāna-rasāśrayaḥ ||
itiDaśarūpaka 3.31 | atra dhīrodāttasya rāmasya sarva-kāryeṣu sāhāyyaṃ pratipadyamāno lakṣmaṇo 'pi dhīrodātta eva na dhīroddhataḥ | tallakṣaṇānāṃ darpa-mātsaryādīnām ananugateḥ mahāsattvatādīnām anugateś ca | dhīrodātta-guṇāś ca tatra tatra yojayiṣyāmaḥ |

atha lakṣmaṇo yauvanodaye 'pi bhrātṛ-gocara-bhakty-atiśayena mahāsattvatayā ca kāmānubhavam utsṛtya niruddhābhiṣekasya vanaṃ gatasya rāmasya padavīṃ chāyevānugamya tat-tad-ṛṣīṇām āśrameṣu nivasatas tasya daśa-varṣāṇy apratyūhena paricaryāṃ vidhāya rākṣasa-pīḍita-muni-jana-prārthanayā nikhila-rākṣasa-vadhaṃ pratijñāya tad-vaira-saṅghaṭanārthaṃ godāvarī-tīraṃ prāptasya bhrātuḥ parṇa-śālā-nirmāṇārthaṃ niyogam avalambya siṃha-vyāghrādi-duṣṭa-sattva-samākīrṇaṃ taṃ deśam avalokya baddha-sannāhas tan-nirākaraṇopāyaṃ parṇaśālā-nirmāṇa-prakāraṃ ca manasā nirdhārayati— jyāghoṣeṇetyādi ||

lg.l: jyā-ghoṣeṇa nirākaromi bhayadān paryanta-bhājo mṛgān parṇaiḥ sadma samāpayāmi śayanaṃ badhnāmi puṣpacchadaiḥ |
vetrāṇām upapādayāmi valayair āyāmināṃ viṣṭaraṃ siñcāmi kṣatim ārdra-paṅkaja-rajo-viddhair apāṃ reṇubhiḥ || 5 ||

ab.p: jyāghoṣeṇa mṛgān siṃha-vyāghrādīn nirākaromi dūrīkaromi | yathā punaḥ pratyāgamanavāñcā na bhavet tathā kaṭhinena jyā-śabdena dūraṃ nayāmīty arthaḥ | anaṅgī-kṛta-rājya-paripālanatvāt niyamitvāc ca nigrahasyānaucityāc ca nirākaromīty uktam | kutaḥ punas tannirākaraṇam ata āha—bhayadān iti || ātmani teṣāṃ bhaya-janakatvābhāve 'pi sāmanyena bhayadān ity uktam | yata āryāyā ārya-darśanārtham āgatānāṃ cātra sthitāḥ santā bhayaṃ dāsyanti ataḥ pūrvam eva nirākaromīty arthaḥ | nanu bhayadā api te yatra na sannidadhate tatra parṇaśālā kriyatām ata āha—paryanta-bhāja iti || ātmāśraya-deśāpekṣayā paryanta-śabdaḥ paryantānātma-deśa-vyatiriktān sarva-dig-upādhikān deśa-viśeṣān bhajantīti paryanta-bhājaḥ | godāvarī-tīra-pradeśān sarvān eva sannihita-jalatvena pracchāya-śītalatvena ca nivāsa-gṛhīkṛtya putra-kaḷatrādibhiḥ saha svairam āsīnān na tu yadṛccha-yāgatān ity arthaḥ | anena nirākaraṇasyāvaśyakartavyatvaṃ darśitam | atra viśeṣaṇa-dvayasya samuccityeva nirākaraṇahetutvaṃ na pratyekam | ato dūrasthānāṃ bhayadānāṃ sannihitānām abhayadānāṃ ca nirākaraṇe na tātparyam | parṇaśālāyāḥ parṇabhūyiṣṭhatvāt tannirmāṇe teṣāṃ pradhāna-kāraṇatvāt parṇair ity uktam | etac ca sādhanāntarāṇām upalakṣaṇam | samāpayāmīti samāpana-nirdhāraṇaṃ karaṇa-prakāra-nirdhāraṇam apy ākṣipati akṛtasya samāpanāyogāt | vetrāṇāṃ valayaiḥ valayī-kṛtair vetrair iti valayīkaraṇa-nirdhāraṇa-prakāraḥ ||
viṣṭaraṃ iti || vratinām āsanaviśeṣam |

upapādayāmi utpādayāmīty arthaḥ | āyāminām iti viṣṭarasya saṃdhāna-kṛta-pāruṣyābhāvaṃ darśayati | śayanīyasya parṇādi-sādhanāntara-saṃbhave 'pi mārdavātiśayam āmodaṃ cāpādayituṃ puṣpacchadair ity uktam | puṣpa-dalair ity arthaḥ | ardrair nisargato rajobhir viddhaiḥ saṃpṛktair apāṃ reṇubhiḥ kṣitiṃ siñcāmi secanena saṃskaromi |
atretivṛtta-bīja-bhūto bhayada-rakṣo-nirākaraṇotsāhaḥ kavinā lakṣmaṇa-mukhena sūcita iti jñeyam ||
tathā kṛtveti || mṛga-nirākaraṇa-prabhṛtīnāṃ vāstu-bali-paryantānāṃ karmaṇām anuṣṭhāna-prakāro yathā nidhāritaḥ tathety arthaḥ |

p.s: aho nu khalu vipannānām avasthā medhāvinī |

yāvad imāṃ parṇaśālāṃ pa
risamāptāṃ tāvat go-dāvaryās taṭaikadeśe taraṅga-mārutair adhva-śramam apanayantam āryam āryayā sārdhaṃ vijñāpayāmi |

ab.p: kṛtvā vilokayann āhety arthāt sidhyati | kathaṃcid ity aparicaya-nimittaḥ kleśo darśitaḥ na tu yathāvad anuṣṭhānābhāvaḥ | evam iti dṛśyamāna-prakāra-nirdeśaḥ ||

śāsanam anuṣṭhitam iti || yady api śāsanasya niyoga-rūpa-vākyātmakatvād anuṣṭheyatvaṃ saṃbhavati tathāpi tad-gocara-karmānuṣṭhānena vinā śāsanasyārthavattvābhāvāt tad-anuṣṭhānaṃ śāsanānuṣṭhānam ity upacaryata ity adoṣaḥ | sarvatra hi pravṛtti-viṣayasya karmaṇaḥ iṣṭa-prāpti-hetutvam aniṣṭa-parihāra-hetutvaṃ vāvagamyaiva pravṛttir dṛṣṭā | iha tu tad-avagataṃ vinā pravṛtti-viṣayasya karmaṇaḥ śāsana-viṣayatva-buddhyaiva pravṛttir iti darśitum evam uktam | ata āha—ājñā gurūṇām avicāraṇīyā iti | evam ātmano 'paricita-karmānuṣṭhāna-sāmarthyaṃ vipina-vāsa-rūpa-vipad-vilasitaṃ manyamānas tan-mahimānaṃ prati vismayam avalambamānas taṭastha-vṛttyā nirūpayati—aho nu khalv iti || avasthā vṛttiḥ medhāvinī medhayā atiśāyinyā buddhi-vṛttyā yuktā | asmāyāmmedhāsrajo viniḥ ity atiśāyane vinipratyayaḥ | atra vipannatvam eva hetur iti niścīyate | avipannānām evaṃbhūta-buddhi-vṛtty-adarśanāt puruṣa-dharmasyāpi medhātiśayasyāvasthāyāṃ samāropaḥ | tatphalasya tatra darśanād iti jñeyam | pūrvam ṛṣyāśrameṣu daśa-varṣāṇi nivasatas tasya muni-janānubhāvāśramābhāga-darśana-sahāya-lābhādibhiḥ rājya-bhraṃśa-vana-vāsa-padeṣu nātīva vipad-buddhir jātā | idānīm vijanaṃ vanaṃ prāpya tatrāryayor nivāsa-vyasanam ālocayataḥ mahatī vipad-buddhir jātā | etac ca bhāvino mātṛ-viṣaya-saṃrambhasya dvāratāṃ pratipadyate | atra kavinā vipannānām ity anena sītāviyogātmikā vipat-sūcitā | medhāvinīty anena sugrīva-sakhya-setu-bandhādy-upāya-darśanaidamarthyaṃ ca sūcitam | evaṃ parṇaśālāṃ kṛtvā tannivedanam adhyavasyati—yāvad iti || yāvad tāvat āryaṃ prati parṇaśālāṃ pari-samāptāṃ vijñāpayāmīty āśayaḥ | āryayā sārdhaṃ taraṅga-mārutair adhyāśramam apanayantam ity anenātmanā 'sannidhānāsahāyāntarrābhāvāc ca tad-vyasanālocana-nimittaḥ khedo vyajyate | tena ca tat-samīpa-gamanatvarā sūcitā | ayam eva khedas tad-darśana-samaya prakaṭībhaviṣyati | evaṃ vakṣyati kaṣṭạṃ vidheḥ karmeti |
atha parikramya sahasātmābhimukham āyantīṃ lalita-sukumāra-rūpāṃ śūrpaṇakhāṃ dṛṣṭvāha—aye iti ||

aya ity adbhuta-darśana-samāvegaṃ sūcayati | iyaṃ saukumāryādi-viśiṣṭatvena dṛśyamānā ākṛtiḥ ākāra-viśeṣaḥ | ākārasyaivāraṇya-viruddhatvāt ākṛtir ity uktam | araṇye viruddhā ayogyeti yāvat | asyā janmano nivāsasya vā araṇye na saṃbhava ity arthaḥ | evaṃ taddarśana-samaye kiṃcid-asaṃbhāvanā jātā | tadaiva tad-rūpa-vaicitrya-darśana-janitena vismayena māyā-prabhāva-jānatena kiñcid autsukyena ca stambhita-prasaro 'bhūt | kuta ity araṇya-virodha-hetv-apekṣā darśitā |

lg.l: asyāti-mātrāyata-locanasya nata-bhruṇaḥ kamra-payo-dharasya |
āścarya-ratnasya vilāsa-yoneḥ kim ākaro dyaur nu vasundharā nu || 6 ||

ab.p: asyāścarya-ratnasya hi vasudhā ākaraḥ kiṃ nu dyaur iti kiṃśabdasya nuśabdābhyāṃ saṃbandhaḥ | atra pāṭha-kramād arthakramaḥ śreyān iti nyāyena pāṭhakramo na vivakṣitaḥ | pāṭha-kramāśrama-prathamaṃ svargākaratvena nirūpitasya punaḥ bhūmyākaratva-parigrahaṇād apakarṣo bhaveti | ata evottaraśloke sanāthīkurvāṇā dharaṇim iti prathamaṃ dharaṇyākaratvaṃ vakṣyate | vasundharā-śabdaḥ vasundharaikadeśa-bhūta-viśiṣṭa-janapada-vivakṣayā prayuktaḥ | itarathā 'raṇya-deśasyāpi tad-eka-deśatvena saṃdeha-koṭy-anupraveśa-saṃbhavāt | ākara-śabdo hi dhana-dhānyādīnām udbhava-sthāne deśe prasiddhaḥ | atra hi ratnotpatti-sthāna-deśasya jijñāsitatvāt ākara ity uktam | autsukya-janito 'yam ākara-vitarkaḥ |

asyāścaryaratnasyety || sādṛśya-nibandhanā sādhya-vasānikā lakṣaṇāśrayitavyā prastutasya strīrūpasya nigīryāś carya-ratnatvenādhyavasitatvāt | yad uktaṃ—Kāvyaprakāśa
viṣayyante kṛte 'nyasmin sā syāt sādhyavasānikā
iti | āścarya-śabdo 'trāyu-dhṛtam itivat kārya-kāraṇa-saṃbandha-hetukayā sāropayā lakṣaṇayāścārya-kāraṇe vartate | ato ratna-śabda-sāmānādhikaraṇyam upapannam | yathoktaṃ—Kāvyaprakāśa
sāropānyā tu yatroktau viṣayī viṣayas tayā
iti | strīrūpasya ratnābheda-pratītyā vaiśiṣtam āropa-phalam | atrāvyabhicāritvāvagatis tatphalam | āyata-locanasyety ādibhir viśeṣaṇaiḥ aṅga-prasaṅga-sauṣṭhavātiśayo darśitaḥ | atha tātkālikān viśeṣān āha—vilāsayoner iti ||

priyatama-darśana-kāle netrādi-vyāpārāṇāṃ viśeṣeṇa lasanaṃ yat sa vilāsaḥ | yathāha—
tātkāliko viśeṣas tu vilāso 'ṅgakriyādiṣu
iti | etac ca śarīrāt bhavasya lalitasya hāva-bhāvādīnāṃ citta-vikārāṇām apy upalakṣaṇam | yathāha—
sukumāro 'ṅgavinyāso masṛṇo lalitaṃ bhavet
iti |
nirvikārātmakāt sattvāt bhāvas tatrādy-avikriyā |
helākṛtaḥ saśṛṅgāro hāvo 'kṣibhrūvilāsakṛt ||
ityādi | yato 'sya strīratnasya mahanīya-deśākaratvam ato 'raṇya-viruddhatvam iti hetutvenaitad vākya-paryavasānam |
evaṃ kṣaṇa-mātraṃ tan-māyā-prabhāva-kṛta-rūpa-vaicitrya-darśana-janita-vismayautsukya-vyākṣipta-citto bhūtvā tadaivātma-smṛtim avalambyātmīyaṃ citta-vikāraṃ nirūpyāha—kim idam iti ||

anenātmani saṃjātasya cāpalasya sattva-balam avalambya nirāsaḥ kriyate | cāpalasyātmany ayogyatve hetum āha—nanv ahaṃ rāmānujo lakṣmaṇa iti || lakṣmaṇa-śabdo 'tra tan-mātre prayojanābhāvāt svārtham abhidhāya tat-sahacāri-vinaya-dhairyādi-guṇa-saṃpannatvam avagamayati | lakṣmaṇaśabdena dharyādi-guṇānām avagame sati teṣāṃ lakṣmaṇa-svarūpāntarbhāva-pratītiḥ phalaṃ bhavati | na svaśabdair abhidhāne tad-antarbhāva-pratītir asti | etad uktaṃ bhavati—naisargika-vinaya-dharyādi-guṇa-yogitvena prasiddhaṃ yanmama lakṣmaṇatvaṃ tasyātyantam ayogyam idaṃ smara-cāpalam iti | evaṃ rāmānujaśabdo 'pi svārtham abhidhāya tan-mātre prayojanābhāvāt tat-samaveta-jyāyaḥ-pāratantryaṃ gamayati | yad idaṃ bālyāt prabhṛti niyamena tat-pāratantryāt sarva-loka-prasiddhaṃ rāmānujatvaṃ tasyāpy etad atyantam anucitam ity arthaḥ |
lakṣmaṇa-śabdenābhipretam arthaṃ vivṛṇoti—sanāthīkurvāṇeti ||

lg.l: sanāthīkurvāṇā dharaṇim athavā dhāma marutāṃ bhaved eṣā kāmaṃ viramatu vitarkaś caladhiyām |
vacaḥ kartuṃ pitror vanam idam avāptasya vaśino vaśe tiṣṭhan bhrātuḥ smara-paravaśaḥ syāṃ katham aham || 7 ||

ab.p: pūrvārdhena eṣā ātmanā dhariṇīṃ sanāthīkurvāṇā kāmaṃ bhavet | athavā marutāṃ dhāma svargaṃ kāmam ity anenānyad vā deśāntaram ity anavasthā darśitā | nāsmākam asmin viṣaye mārga-dṛṣṭa-tṛṇādivat svalpo 'py ādaro yata ity arthāt vākyasya paryavasānam | ato 'yam ākara-vitarko viramatu anenākara-vitarkeṇālam ity arthaḥ | na hy upekṣāgocare vastuni parīkṣayā kiñcit prayojanam iti bhāvaḥ | na kevalaṃ prayojanābhāvād evāyaṃ vitarko nāśriyate kintv avadyāpādakatvāc cety āha—vitarkaś caladhiyām iti || vitarka-śabdasya pūrvottara-padābhyāṃ saha saṃbandhaḥ | yata evaṃjātīyako vitarkaś caladhiyāṃ bhavati ato 'smav apy anuvartamāno 'yaṃ vitarkaś cala-dhītvam āpādayati | na cāsmāsv anuvartate vinaya-dhairyādi-guṇa-śālitvena cala-dhītvābhāvād iti tebhyo vyatireko 'rthād gamyate |

rāmānuja-śabdenābhipretam arthaṃ vivṛṇoti—vacaḥ kartum iti || ahaṃ kathaṃ smara-paravaśaḥ syāṃ na kenāpi hetunā smara-vaivaśyasyāvakāśaḥ | atra hetuḥ—bhrātur vaśe tiṣṭhan iti || na tu bhrātrā nirbandhena svavaśaṃ prāpitaḥ | svayam eva vaśaṃ prāptaḥ | yo 'haṃ svayam eva bālyāt prabhṛti bhrātṛ-paricaryāṃ paraṃ darmaṃ jānānaḥ etāvantaṃ kālaṃ tad-vaśe tiṣṭhāmi sa evedānīṃ kathaṃ smara-paravaśo bhaveyam | avyavasthita-cittatvaṃ hi tadā syāt | veśeṣata idānīṃ āryasyāvasthā-viśeṣe nirūpyamāṇe 'tyantam anucitam evedam ity āha—vaca iti || yadi rājyasthasyānanuṣṭhita-guru-niyogasya vā vaśavartī na syāṃ tadā nātyantaṃ doṣāya bhavet | saṃprati punaḥ guru-niyogam anuṣṭhātuṃ vana-vāsa0kleśam anubhavato dharmānuṣṭhāna-sāhāyyam avalambya varamāno 'haṃ kathaṃ kāma-paravaśaḥ syām iti vanam idam avāptasyety anenoktam | pitror vacaḥ kartum ity anenāryācaritenaiva gurv-anugmanasya mahimānaṃ jānānaḥ katham evaṃbhūtaḥ syām ity ayam artho vyajyate | punar api hetvantaram āha—vaśina iti || jitendriyasya vaśe vartamānaḥ katham ajitendriyaḥ syām ity arthaḥ | atra lalitādarśanātmakena vighnenākulīkṛtād api guru-paricaryā-vyavasāyād latatvena nāyakaguṇo darśitaḥ | yathāha—vyavasāyād acalanaṃ sthairyaṃ vighnākulād api iti | atr pūrvārdha-gatayānādaroktyā nirīkṣaṇasya nindāgarbhatvaṃ vyajyate | evaṃ nindāgarbham īkṣitāyā api tasyā ānavartanena punas tannivartanārthaṃ paruṣataravīkṣaṇam api yogyatayā labhyata eveti tad api kṛtam ity avaseyam |

atha nāṭaka-pratipādyasya sarvasya nāyaka-pratināyaketivṛttasya bīja-bhūtaṃ śūrpaṇakhā-vṛttāntaṃ lakṣmaṇa-mukhena sūcitopakramaṃ pratipādayati | iha khalu śūrpaṇakhā rāvaṇa0nihata-bhartṛkā tan-niyogena lokottaraṃ puruṣaṃ patitvena parigrahītum itas tataḥ saṃcarantī jana-sthānam āsādya godāvarī-tīra-gataṃ raghuvīraṃ dṛṣṭvā madanākula-hṛdayā ātmano rūpaṃ tad-rūpa-guṇānanurūpaṃ manyamānā māyā-balena lalita-sukumāraveṣā bhūtvā tam upagamya tato 'labdha-manorathā tena lakṣmaṇābhibhamana-vyājena pratyākhyātā tato 'pasarpaṇam icchanty api tan-niyogakaraṇaṃ tat-prasāda-hetuṃ manyamānā tato nirgatya mārge gacchanty evātmābhimukham āgacchantaṃ saumitriṃ dṛṣṭvā vismayautsukya-vivaśā rāma-sādṛśyena tam avagamya tad-rūpātiśayaṃ vibhāvayati—ham ityādi ||

ham ity avicārita-rūpātiśaya-darśana-prabhava-harṣa-samuttho vāg-rūpo 'nubhāvaḥ | sarveṣām eva saundarya-saukumāryādīnāṃ tathā-bhūtatvenaiva dṛśyamānatvāt sa eveti tattvāropaḥ | āropa-phalaṃ ca sarvathaivābheda-pratītiḥ | apiśabdo guṇāśraya-samuccayārthaḥ | taddarśana-samaye pūrvaṃ tad-ekāśrayatvena ye nirūpetā guṇāḥ teṣāṃ sarveṣām asminn api vidyamānatvāt ayam api sa eveti samuccayopapattiḥ | ayogya-vyavacchedārtha eva-śabdaḥ | na hi tādṛśaḥ kaścid asādhāraṇo guṇo 'smin jāgarti yena bheda-pratyaya-sāpekṣaṃ tat-sadṛśo 'yam iti sādṛśyaṃ na rāmo 'yam ity arāmatvaṃ vā gamyate | anena pṛthaktva-mātram eva bheda-hetur na pratīti-bheda iti vyajyate | pūrvaṃ rāma-samīpād āgacchantyās tad-ānukūlyālābhaṃ lakṣmaṇasyātādṛg-guṇatvaṃ ca nirūpyātmānam adhanyaṃ manyamānāyā mahān nirvedo jātaḥ | punas tādṛśa-guṇasyāsya darśanena saṃjātasyānandasya sa eva nirvedaḥ poṣa-hetuḥ saṃvṛtta iti jñeyam | evaṃ tad-darśanānantaram uttamāṅganā-samucita-vrīḷā-sādhvasādibhiḥ tat-purato 'pavarta-mānam ātmānaṃ paśyatas tasya kiñcit saṃjātaṃ citta-vikāra-manu-bhāva-mukhenālakṣya kṛtārthā punaḥ tatkṣaṇād eva tasya sāvajñaṃ paruṣataraṃ dṛṣṭi-pātam avalokyātmānurāgāpārajñānāt tasyānurāga-bhaṅgam āśaṅkya viśeṣato vrīḷādibhiḥ ātmānurāgaṃ sphuṭataraṃ prakāśya tat-purato 'tiṣṭhat | vrīḷāṃ nāṭayatīty anena vrīḷādīnām ādhikyam evoktam | itarathā vilāsayoner ity anena sāvajña-paruṣatara-dṛ̣ṣṭi-pātāt pūrvam udāttasya vilāsa-yogasyāṃbhavaḥ prasajyeta |
atha saumitriḥ svavyāpāra-viruddhaṃ niśācarī-vyāpāraṃ nirīkṣya nirūpayati—pratikūlam iti ||

lg.l: ācārānanucaratā tapo-dhanānāṃ sāvajñaṃ paruṣataraṃ mayekṣitāpi |
savrīḷā vadanam adhaḥkaroti kampāt uttaṃsa-pragalita-ṣaṭpadena mūrdhnā || 8 ||

ab.p:
pratyakṣeṇa dṛśyamānam idam ācaritam ācaraṇam | bhāve niṣṭhā | pratikūlam asmād vyāpārasyātyantaviruddham | kathaṃ virodha ity ata āha | yat yata eṣā idānīm araṇya-madhye sahasā dṛśyamānā avidita-kula-nāmadheyādikā tapo-dhanānām ācārān anucaratā mayā sāvajñaṃ paruṣataraṃ cokṣatāpi savrīḷā kampāddhetoḥ uttamebhyaḥ śiro 'laṅkārabhūtebhyaḥ kusumebhyaḥ pragalitāḥ pracyutāḥ pūrvaṃ parimalād alolupatayāvasthitāḥ ṣaṭpadā yasmin | atra kampātiśayenānubhāvena sādhvasātiśayo gamyate | tena mūrdhnā saha vartamānā vadanam adaḥ karoti | atrādhomukhatvenānubhāvena vrīḷātiśayo gamyate | yathoktaṃ—
durācārādibhir vrīḍā dhārṣṭyābhāvas tam unnayet |
sācīkṛtāṅgavaraṇavaivarṇyādhomukhādibhiḥ ||
iti | vrīḍā-sāhdvasātiśayenānurāgātiśayaḥ prakāśyate tayos tat-kāryatvāt | tapodhanānām iti || parama-premāspadatva-guṇa-yogāt tapasi dhanaśabdopacāraḥ | sarvasyaiva hi dhanaṃ premāspadaṃ bhavati | tapasvināṃ tu tapa eva parama-premāspadaṃ bhavati | ataḥ teṣāṃ tad eva dhanam | anenārthakalatrādi-viṣayābhilāṣo nirastaḥ | tena tad-ācārānuvidhāyino 'pi tad-abhāvaḥ prakāśyate | ācārān yam aniyamādīn tad-aṅga-bhūtaṃs triṣavaṇa-snānādīṃś cānucaratā tad-vad anutiṣṭhatā ity anena tapaś-caraṇācihna-bhūta-jaṭā-valkalādi-dhāraṇaṃ paśyantyā asyā madāntakāgamanaṃ matpurato 'vasthānaṃ vānucitam | tatrāpi kamanīya-veṣābharaṇam ātma-ramaṇam ivaivaṃbhūtaṃ mām avalokayantyā yad idaṃ vrīḍādibhir ātmānurāga-prakāśanaṃ tad atyantaṃ viruddham iti dyotitam | tatrāpy evaṃ vilasantī nindāgarbham īkṣitā ātmakāntena sādaraṃ prekṣyamāṇeva pūrvasmād adhikataraṃ yad vrīḍādibhir ātmānurāgātiśaya-prakāśanaṃ karoti tan mahāntaṃ nirbandhaṃ dyotayti | punar nirvartayituṃ paruṣam paruṣataraṃ ca vīkṣitā nija-preyasā praṇayātiśaya-garbhaṃ vilokyamāneva yad ātmānaṃ tat-tad-vilāsāspadaṃ karoti tad atyantaṃ dainyam āpādayati | yathā yathā krameṇa mayā vairāgyātiśayaḥ prakāśyate tathā tathaiṣā rāgātiśayaṃ vibhāvayati tat-tad-etat kvacid api na dṛṣṭapūrvam |
atha niśācarī evaṃ vilāsa-viśeṣaiḥ prayatamānāpi utpanna-dhvastasyānurāgasyānudayaṃ sāvajña-dṛṣṭi-pātādy-anubhāvair anumāya cintayati—kiṃ nu khalv ayam api bhaṇisyatīti ||

p.s: kiṃ ṇu khu aaṃ vi bhaṇassadi, hodu ettiaṃ dāva kahaïssam |

ab.p: rāmeṇa yathoktaṃ tathaiva vā, utānyathaiva vety arthaḥ | evaṃ nirūpya jayatv ārya ity evaṃrūpaṃ samudācāraṃ kartum upakramamāṇā prayāṇānmukhaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā ābhimukhya-saṃpādana-prakāraṃ manasā nirdhārayate—bhavatv iti || bhavatu-abdo mānasa-niścayam āha | tāvat prathamam etāvan-mātraṃ kathayiṣyāmi | yāvatā vacanenābhimukhyaṃ labhyate | paścād ābhimukhye saṃjāte 'bhilaṣitaṃ nivedayāmīti bhāvaḥ || ārya itas tāvad āgamyatām iti śeṣaḥ | kiṃ vāṅ-mātreṇāpy evaṃbhūtaṃ janam anabhinandya jigamiṣasīti bhāvaḥ |

evaṃ tasyāś ceṣṭāviśeṣaiḥ vacana-viśeṣeṇa ca ātma-citta-vilobhanārthaṃ duradhyavasāyam avagamyamānayā saha saṃbhāṣaṇam api prasaktānuprasaktyā sānubandhaṃ sat prastuta-kāryasya niyamasya ca bhaṅgam āpādayed iti niścitya punar loka-vṛttānusāreṇāpy asyām avasthāyāṃ prativacanaṃ na dātavyam ity adhvayavsyati—na samādhiḥ strīṣv iti || loko loka-vṛttam āgataṃ prati svāgatavacanādi | samādhis taṃ na jānāti | yady api samādhi-yukta-puruṣa-niṣṭha eva taddhetuko loka-vṛttānta-jñānābhāvaḥ tathāpi samādher avyabhicāreṇa taddhetutvaṃ darśayituṃ tad-āropo yujyate | yadi samādhis tarhi lokajñatvam api nāsty eva | tat kiṃ tad-abhāvasya puruṣa-niṣṭhatva-kathaneneti bhāvaḥ | atra samādhi-śabdena samādhy-avasthā-yogyatvam evocyate | na tat-kāle samādhi-yogaḥ | itarathā ātmānaṃ na paraṃ vetti yogī yuktaḥ samādhinā iti nyāyena sva-paravibhāga-jñānābhavaḥ prasajyeta | ata eva strīṣv iti loka-vṛtta-jñānābhāvasya viṣayaniyamaḥ kṛtaḥ | etad uktaṃ bhavati—tapasvināṃ strīviṣayaṃ loka-vṛttānta-jñānaṃ nāstīti prativacanadānābhāvena na kaścid doṣa iti | samādhir nāma upāsakasya yam aniyamādy-aṅgasaptaka-sādhya upāsya-niṣṭhaś citta-laya ucyate | yad uktaṃ—
yam aniyamāsana eva nāyāmāḥ pratyāhṛtiḥ sahaiva dhāraṇayā |
dhyānaṃ cāpi samādhiḥ proktāny aṅgāni yogayogyāni ||
satyam ahiṃsā samatā dhṛtir asteyaṃ kṣamārjavaṃ ca tathā |
vairāgyam iti yamaḥ syāt svādhyāya-tapo 'rvanā-vratāni tathā ||
santōṣaś ca saṃśauco niyamaḥ syād āsanaṃ ca pañcavidhaṃ |
padma-svastika-vajraka-bhadraka-vīrāhvayāḥ kramāt tadapi ||
recaka-puraka-kumbhaka-bhedāt trividhaḥ prabhañjanāyāmaḥ |
muñced dakṣiṇayānilam athānayed vāmayā ca madhyagayā ||
saṃsthāpayec ca nāḍyetyevaṃ proktāni recakādīni |
ṣoḍaśa-śata-dviguṇa-catuṣṣaṣṭikamātrāṇi tāni ca kramaśaḥ ||
cittātmaika-dhṛtasya prāṇasya sthāna-sahṛtiḥ sthānāt |
pratāhāro jñeyaḥ caitanya-yutasya samyag anilasya ||
rathānasthāpanakarma proktā syād dharaṇeti tattvajñaiḥ |
yo manasi devatāyā bhāvaḥ syād asya mantriṇaḥ samyak ||
saṃsthāpayec ca tatrety evaṃ dhyānaṃ vadanti tattvavedaḥ |
sattā-mātraṃ nityaṃ śuddham api nirañjanaṃ ca yat proktam ||
pravicintyaṃ ca yat tasmin cittalayaḥ syāt samādhir uddiṣṭaḥ ||
iti |

p.s: ajja asadisaṃ via ajjassa saraṇāadassa uvakkhaṇaṃ itthiā-jaṇassa |

ab.p:
atha niśācarī tūṣṇīṃ gacchantaṃ taṃ sāmaprayogāsādhyaṃ manyamānādṛṣṭaśaṅkajanakena bhedena
prayatnaḥ sarvathā kāryo matimadbhir manīṣite |
yāvad balānupekṣyatvād abhipretasya vastunaḥ ||
iti nyāyena svābhimataṃ sādhayitum adhyavasyantī kiñcid anugamya sābhiprāyam āha---āryetyādinā || śaraṇāgatasya strījanasya upekṣaṇam āryasyāsadṛśam iva na kasyacid api śaraṇāgatopekṣaṇaṃ sadṛśaṃ viśeṣato rājñāṃ tatrāpi bhavadvaṃśyānāṃ tato 'pi dharmaikaniṣṭhasya bhavata ity abhiprāyaḥ |
evaṃ rakṣitṛgataṃ viśeṣam uktvā rakṣyagataṃ viśeṣam āha---śaraṇāgatasya strījanasyeti || śastrur api śaraṇāgataś cet nopekṣaṇīyaḥ kiṃ punar anāthastrījana iti bhāvaḥ ||

asadṛśam iveti || niścaye saty api asadṛśam ivety uktaṃ taccittānuvartanārthaṃ na kenāpi hetunāsmadupekṣaṇaṃ sadṛśam iti pratibhāti | upekṣyāmahe ca bhavatā vayaṃ ato bhavadbahumānād asaḍrśam ivety eva vaktuṃ śaknuma ity abhiprāyo vyajyate | atra vyasanaviśeśaṇam anuktvaiva śaraṇāgatasyety uktir evaṃbhūtaṃ tasyā durabhiprāyaṃ sūcayati | yadi sākṣād enaṃ prati smarasaṃtāparūpaṃ vyasanaviśeṣaṃ nivedayāmi tato viraktasyāsyātyantam upekṣaiva bhavet | ataḥ śaraṇāgatasyety etāvad abhihite tena sūcitaṃ vyasanaviśeṣam asau svayam eva pṛcchati---kas te vyasanaviśeṣa iti ||

anenaivam anuyuktā yadi madīyaṃ vyasanam apākartuṃ samartho 'si tarhi vakṣyāmīty ukte punar asāmarthya-prasaṅga-bhayāt pratijñāsyati---sarvathā te vyasanam apākariṣyāmīti | tad avilambam ucyatām ity ukte saty anaṅgatāparūpam idaṃ madvyasanaṃ nivedayiṣyāmīti tataḥ saty avacana-saṃrakṣaṇa-paratvād anicchann api māṃ parigrahīṣyatīti |

p.s: nahi nahi, mayopeṣyate bhavatī sāṃpratam avasthāntaraśocanīyasya guror alaṅghanīyena śāsanena khalu |

ab.p: evaṃ tasyā ātmatopekṣyamāṇāyā apy anugacchantyā vyavahāraviśeṣeṇa durabhiprāyaṃ vijñāya vyasanaviśeṣam apṛṣṭvaiva tad upapāditam upekṣaṇasyāsadṛśatvaṃ niṣedhati---na hi na hīti || na hi na hīti dvivacanena sadṛśatvaṃ śaṅkitum apy aśakyam iti darśayati | na hi na hīty anenaivārthād uktād uktam upekṣaṇasya yogyatvaṃ hetunopapādayituṃ pratijānāti | bhavatī mayopekṣyate yat tat sāmprataṃ yuktam evety arthaḥ | kuta ity ata āha---avasthety || guroḥ śāsanena hetau tṛtīyā | iha viṣaya-viśeṣānuktyā guru-śāsanaṃ śāsana-buddhyaivānuṣṭheyam | na tv atra viṣaya-viśeṣāpekṣayety darśayati | nanu śaraṇāgatarakṣaṇam api tadvad eva kartavyam ata āha---alaṅghanīyeneti || na hi kartavyāntaram apekṣya guruśāsanaṃ laṅghanīyaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ | alaṅghanīyenety aviśeṣābhidhānaṃ niyojyaviśeṣāpekṣayā deśakālādy-apekṣayā vā guruśāsanaṃ na laṅghanīyam iti dyotayitum | nanu yāvad anuṣṭhita-guru-niyogaḥ kṛta-kṛtyatām upayāsi tāvad ahaṃ pratipālayāmīty ata āha----avasthāntaraśocanīyasyeti || vanavāsātmakenāvasthāviśeṣeṇa śocanīyasyeti | anena yadaivāyam avasthāntaram atyeṣyati tāvat mama tat-paricaraṇam ekam eva dharma iti darśitam |

p.s: jaï evvaṃ, imaṃ vi jaṇaṃ aṃtareṇa āṇṇā gurujaṇassa ṇa khu dāva uvakkhaṇaṃ aruhadi |

ab.p: atha tad-vacanenaiva tasya guru-niyogādhīnatvam avadhārya kṛtārthā niśācarī nijābhilaṣita-gocaraṃ guru-śāsanaṃ nivedayitum upakramate----yady evam iti || yadi guru-śāsanasya sarvathālaṅghanīyatvaṃ tarhi śaraṇāgatam imaṃ janam antareṇādhikṛtya bhavantaṃ prati yā gurujanasyājñā sāpi nopekṣaṇam arhatīti | tāvacchabdo 'vadhāranārthaḥ kenāpi hetunopekṣaṇaṃ nārhaty eva | śaraṇāgatatvena gurvājñayā cāyaṃ jano 'nugrahītavya eveti bhāvaḥ |

atha pūrvam eva tasyā nirbandhātiśayena saṃjātanirvedaḥ saumitriḥ punas tad-abhimata-saṃpādana-gocaraṃ guru-niyogam ākarṇya kupitaḥ prāha----ā iti || ā iti kope | ās tu syāt kopa-pīḍayoḥ iti || ko gurujano bhrātṛ-paricaraṇārtham evaṃ vanaṃ prāptaṃ mām anyasminn ucite karmaṇi ājñāpayati | hitopadeśitvābhāvāt tasya gurutvam eva nāstīti bhāvaḥ | kas tāvad iti || nityam evāryasamīpe vartamānasyānavasita-tad-ājñānuṣṭhānasyānya-mukhenāryakartṛkaṃ madhye kāryāntaravijñāpanam aprasaṅgāt buddhipathaṃ nādhyarukṣat yatas tenānyabuddhyā kopaḥ saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ | kaikeyī-durvyāpāra-śaṅkayeti kenacid vadanti ||

bhayaṃ nirūpyeti | atropasargo dhātvarthānuvartaka eva | nitya-duṣṭa-bhayaṅkara-sattva-jātāyāḥ nikhila-jana-bhayadāyinyā apy asyāḥ kopāvasthāyāṃ tad-ākāro bhayajanako 'bhūt | anena tasyāparicchedya-prabhāvatvaṃ gamyate |

evaṃ kṣaṇamātraṃ bhayavivaśā bhūtvā guru-śabdārthānyathājñānam eva kopa-hetur iti jñātvā tattva-nivedanena tad-bhramam apanetuṃ tat-prasādaṃ prārthayate---prasīdatu prasīdatv iti | atra dvivacanena prasādāgrahātiśayo gamyate |

guru-jana-śabdābhipretam arthaṃ spaṣṭīkaroti---āryo rāma evājñāpayati || bhavantaṃ prati man-mukhena yat kiñcit kartavyaṃ karmāntaram ājñāpayatīti yojyam | itarathā jñāpanasya vartamānatvaṃ na ghaṭate | eva-śabdenānyathā kopaṃ mā kṛthā iti gamyate |

p.s: hanta pūrvam anayā dṛṣṭaḥ khalv āryaḥ, bhavatu, prasādayāmi guru-vacana-muhūrta-bhājanībhūtām atrabhavatīm |

ab.p: atha tad-vacanād evāryasyājñety avagamya salajjam āha---hanta pūrvam iti || aham avimṛśyakāritvenānayā paricchinna iti lajjā | hantety anen kaṣṭaṃ mayā bhrāntyāpy ārya-śāsanam aviveka-nimittena kopena nirastam abhūd ity anutāpātmakaḥ khedo vyajyate | khalu-śabdo 'vadhāraṇe || dṛṣṭa iti || darśanaṃ saṃlāpasyāpy upalakṣaṇam | pūrvaṃ kṛtasyāvamānasya prasādanam eva prāyaścittam ity adhyavasyati---prasādayāmīty || prasādane hetuḥ---guru-vacana-bhājanī-bhūtām iti || bhavacchabdaḥ praśasyatame yuṣmad-arthe prasiddhaḥ | atrāvivakṣitvā yuṣmad-arthaṃ praśasyatamatvaǖivakṣayaivātrabhavatīm ity ucyate | asyāḥ praśasyatamatve guru-vacanāspadatvam eva hetuḥ | evaṃ svayam eva nirūpya tāṃ prasādayati---bhadra iti || gurv-ājñā-pātra-bhūtatvena sukṛta-paripāka-śālini idānīm āryaḥ kiṃ karmāntaraṃ mayā kartavyaṃ tvan-mukhenājñāpayatīti |
atha niśācarī tad-vacanenābhilaṣita-siddhi-dvāra-bhūtena kṛtārthāvadhānaṃ prārthayate---śṛṇotv ārya iti | anena kāryasya gurutaratvena śrāvyatvaṃ prakāśyate |

p.s: ajja mae saha attaṇo pariaraṇaṃ ajja-rāmo āṇavedi |ārya mayā saha ātmanaḥ paricaraṇam ārya-rāmaḥ ājñāpayati

ab.p:
atha kṛtāvadhānaṃ prati gurv-ājñāṃ nivedayati---ārya mayā sahātmanaḥ paricaraṇam āryarāma ājñāpayatīti | atra bhāryātvena mama parigraham ājñāpayatīty ukte mat-parigrahaṃ guru-paricaryāvirodhinaṃ matvā pūrvavan mām upakṣetaiva | ato 'sya yad abhilaṣitaṃ guru-paricaraṇaṃ tatra sāhāyya-saṃpādanam eva gurv-ājñā-gocaratvena nivedanīyam | ato 'nena dvāreṇa labdha-sannidhānā pāda-prasārikānyāyena krameṇābhilaṣitaṃ sādhayiṣyāmīty evaṃbhūtena durabhiprāyeṇa sākṣāt-svābhimata-gocaratvena gurv-ājñā-nivedanaṃ na kṛtam | tathā coktaṃ---
yasya yasya hi yo bhāvaḥ tena tena praviśya tam |
svayaṃ tadbhāva-saṃyuktaḥ kṣipram ātmavaśaṃ nayet ||
iti | ayaṃ ca vākyārthaḥ | pūrvam evārya-paricaraṇe sahāyāntarābhāvena parikhinnaḥ śaraṇāgatam imaṃ janaṃ dṛṣṭvā karuṇārdra-hṛdayaḥ san evaṃ vyajijñapat---he lakṣmaṇa tvayā paricaraṇe nija-niyama-nivartane ca sāhāyyārtham eṣā parigṛhyatām anena śreyodvayaṃ bhaviṣyati yad asyā anāthāyāḥ sanāthatvaṃ yac ca bhavataḥ sāhāyyalābha iti mad-vacanād ucyatām iti | etat sarvaṃ mayā sahety anena sūcitam || rāma iti || na kevalam ākārata evābhirāmatvaṃ kintu dayāmādhuryādiguṇagaṇaviśeṣair apīti darśitam |

lg.l: vāso valkalam āspadaṃ viṭapino vanyaṃ śarīra-sthitiḥ śayyā darbhalatā prasādhanam apāṃ varṣī jaṭānāṃ bharaḥ |
bāle kiṃ bahunā vane vanamṛga-nyāyasya na tvaṃ padaṃ sāraṅgākṣi tapobhṛtaḥ kva tapasāṃ śatruḥ kva saṅkalpajaḥ || 9 ||

p.s: ṇa so ajjo ajjāe saha vattadi |
bhadre na jānāsi paramārthato vṛttam āryasya |
yāvad āryas tīrṇa-pratijñaḥ prakṛti-maṇḍalaṃ guru-janaṃ bharataṃ ca na paśyati, tāvad ekam eva dharmam avalambate |
jaï evvaṃ ettha sā kiṃ karodi |
jaha ajjaṃ sā uvaaradi taha tumaṃ vi ahaṃ uvaarissam |

lg.l: yatate yasya niṣkṛtyai janaḥ sarvo 'pi buddhimān |
dāsyaṃ tat svayam icchantī mugdhā tvaṃ mugdhalocane || 10 ||

p.s:
evaṃ vyāharantīm enām kim iti pratyādi
śāmi |
bhadre āryasya parṇa-gṛha-praveśānantaram atrabhavatīm abhipreta-sthāne drakṣyāmi |
jaï evvaṃ ajja, tassa paṇṇasālassa passado evva paḍivālaïssam |

lg.l: kvedaṃ vanaṃ vanacarair api durvigāhaṃ kveyaṃ vadhūḥ kuvalayacchavicoranetrā |
hemāravinda-makaranda-rasopayogāṃ kaḥ śraddadhīta jaladhau kalahaṃsa-kanyām || 11 ||

p.s: devi nagarādhivāsāt saviśeṣa iva vanādhivāso me pratibhāti |

lg.l: udyānaṃ vanabhūmayaḥ kusumitair udgandhayaḥ pādapaiḥ śailā nirjhara-hāsino jaladhara-śyāmā giriḥ kṛtrimaḥ |
nadyaḥ sārasa-mūrcchitormi-valayā gharmābhiṣekāspadaṃ śītāḥ śīkara-saṅgamāt surabhayo mitraṃ sarojānilāḥ || 12 ||

p.s: ajjaütta jāva ahaṃ jīvāmi dāva ettha evva vasiduṃ me buddhī jaï taha ṇa kilaṃmadi sākede guru-jaṇo |āryaputra yāvad ahaṃ jīvāmi tāvad atraiva vastuṃ me buddhiḥ yadi tathā na klāmyati sākete gurujanaḥ |
ayam ayam āryaḥ, aho nu khalu kaṣṭaṃ vidheḥ karma, nahi nahi, kaikeyyāḥ |

lg.l: āryeṇāṃśukam ujjhatā dhṛtam abhūd āpāṭalaṃ valkalaṃ vinyastaṃ padam āryayā vṛkavadhū-pādāṅka-pāṃsau pathi |
saṃtāpais tanutām upaiti bharataḥ paryākulāḥ kosalāḥ vaidhavyaṃ hatam āsthitā tvam api te dhik karma sarvaṅkaṣaṃ || 13 ||
mārge nirvṛti-mārga-mārgaṇa-parān ārādhayanto munīn svairaṃ sevita-tīrtha-sindhu-payaso dūraṃ nirastādhayaḥ |
mātrā lakṣmaṇa kekayendra-sutayā, vyājena nītā vayaṃ svām utsṛjya dhuraṃ bhuvo muni-vanaṃ yātavyam ikṣvākubhiḥ || 14 ||

p.s: satyam āha lokaḥ na santy aguṇā guṇavatām iti |
lakṣmaṇa kiṃ nādyāpi śāntas te mātari saṃrambhaḥ |

lg.l: mātroḥ prasnavibhiḥ stanais tvayi mudā saṃphulla-dṛ̣ṣṭyos tayoḥ tātasyāśrujalaiḥ samaṃ śirasi te haimāt kṣarantyo ghaṭāt |
āpas tatr vasiṭḥa-mantra-jayinā mantreṇa ruddhā yayā tāṃ lokotsava-kāla-rātri-madayāṃ manye kathaṃ mātaram || 15 ||
hate rājye bhavān bhaktyā pratyācaṣṭe svamātaram |
aho saṃtoṣa-bāhyānām adharmaika-rataṃ manaḥ || 16 ||
sādhāraṇī nayavidāṃ dharaṇiḥ kalatram astrāṇi mitram arayaḥ sahajāḥ sutāś ca |
pāpāt parasya patanaṃ narakeṣu lābhaḥ dve cāmare ca sitamātapavāraṇaṃ ca || 17 ||

p.s: yady evam ahaṃ tava prathamam upālambha-viṣayaḥ |

lg.l: indra-kalpe sthite rājñi sneha-paryaśru-locane |
abhiṣekāya nirlajjo yaḥ siṃhāsanam āsthitaḥ || 18 ||

p.s: vayasā pariṇato 'ham iti tātas tathā tvayi pratipannaḥ |

lg.l: na kathaṃ rakṣituṃ śaktaḥ pṛthvīm ātmadevatām |
dānavonmūlanaṃ tejo yasya dyām api rakṣati || 19 ||

p.s: kintu putra-snehāt tayā cāpalyaṃ kṛtam iti |

lg.l: niyama-salilaṃ pitror hartuṃ nirīkṣaṇa-vandhyayoḥ kṣipati kalaśaṃ toyādhāre paṭu-dhvanitaṃ sute |
uṣasi mṛgatāṃ yātā rājñā vana-dvipa-śaṅkayā rabhasam iṣur unmuktaḥ kālād asūn aharat svayam || 20 ||

p.s: kā uṇa aṇṇahā attāṇaṃ loaṃ a viṇāsedi |

lg.l: dhanur-jyā-nirghoṣaiḥ sarabhasam apāstaṃ mṛgakulaṃ kṛtā parṇaiḥ śālā śayanam api puṣpaiḥ pratinavaiḥ |
latābhir vetrāṇāṃ viracitam abhūd āsanam idaṃ jalaiḥ sindhoḥ siktā bali-kusuma-bhājo vanabhuvaḥ || 21 ||
aśaṅkitā śithilaya pāṃsudhūsaraṃ stanāṃśukaṃ śuka-haritaṃ śukālape |
viśoṣitādhara-kamalaṃ visarpatā taraṅgitaṃ tava mukha-gandha-vāhinā || 22 ||
